name: part_005
file: tmp_【#TheBrokenPromise】hololive English -Promise- 1st Anniversary Musical： The Broken Promise [Oi0WDyT6xTE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: The group is disoriented and confused in the forest, under the influence of Fauna's spell.
Fauna reveals her manipulation of the forest and her complicated feelings for Mumei.
A magical book transitions the scene from the enchanted forest to a town.
The group arrives in town and decides to split up to attend to various tasks.
IRyS watches the others walk away and delivers a monologue about her envy of Fauna's grace.

subtitles.original: Mechanical infiltrators?
subtitles.english: Mechanical infiltrators?

subtitles.original: Back, you fiends!
subtitles.english: Back, you fiends!

subtitles.original: The hag!
subtitles.english: The hag!

subtitles.original: Not my teas!
subtitles.english: Not my teas!

subtitles.original: There's no hag.
subtitles.english: There's no hag.

subtitles.original: The spell hath worked perfectly.
subtitles.english: The spell has worked perfectly.

subtitles.original: Look at the chaos I've created.
subtitles.english: Look at the chaos I've created.

subtitles.original: 'Tis almost too easy.
subtitles.english: It's almost too easy.

subtitles.original: Alas, I had no choice.
subtitles.english: Alas, I had no choice.

subtitles.original: They wanted to leave so soon.
subtitles.english: They wanted to leave so soon.

subtitles.original: Why would they want to miss out on the magic this forest holds?
subtitles.english: Why would they want to miss out on the magic this forest holds?

subtitles.original: Ah, do I manipulate them too much?
subtitles.english: Ah, do I manipulate them too much?

subtitles.original: Nay, they will thank me for showing them the wonders of the forest.
subtitles.english: Nay, they will thank me for showing them the wonders of the forest.

subtitles.original: The forest, however, is not nearly as magical as my beloved Namu.
subtitles.english: The forest, however, is not nearly as magical as my beloved Namu.

subtitles.original: She knows these woods so well.
subtitles.english: She knows these woods so well.

subtitles.original: I wonder why.
subtitles.english: I wonder why.

subtitles.original: Every time she speaks, I can't help but be drawn to her.
subtitles.english: Every time she speaks, I can't help but be drawn to her.

subtitles.original: I may have cast a spell on her...
subtitles.english: I may have cast a spell on her...

subtitles.original: ...but 'tis she that hath enchanted me.
subtitles.english: ...but it is she who has enchanted me.

subtitles.original: Follow me.
subtitles.english: Follow me.

subtitles.original: 檻の中 あたしの愛猫
subtitles.english: Inside the cage, my beloved cat

subtitles.original:
愛猫
Lyrics, Music: biz, ZERA
subtitles.english:
Aineko
Lyrics, Music: biz, ZERA

subtitles.original: お帰りなさい 君にニャオ
subtitles.english: Welcome home, a 'meow' to you

subtitles.original: 悪い子ね 汚れたお身体で
subtitles.english: Bad child, with such a dirty body

subtitles.original: 行きはよいで 帰りは怖い
subtitles.english: The way there is fine, the way back is scary

subtitles.original: 愛を知らない 飽き猫さん
subtitles.english: A fickle cat who knows no love

subtitles.original: 間抜けな愛嬌とかそりゃ結構
subtitles.english: Stupidly charming, that's quite enough

subtitles.original: 睨めっこ ほらバレバレで もう一躁
subtitles.english: Staring contest, look, it's obvious, one more stir

subtitles.original: なんで？ お仕置きだ 自己嫌悪
subtitles.english: Why? It's punishment, self-loathing

subtitles.original: 君はあたしだけの愛猫だよ？
subtitles.english: You are my beloved cat, only mine?

subtitles.original: ダンダン好キニナル 好キニナル ネェ 愛シテ
subtitles.english: Gradually falling in love, falling in love, hey, love me

subtitles.original: ダンダン好キニナル 好キニナル ネェ 愛シテ
subtitles.english: Gradually falling in love, falling in love, hey, love me

subtitles.original: 可愛いね 首輪つけてニャオ
subtitles.english: So cute, put on the collar, meow

subtitles.original: 大切に 愛でてあげるニャオ
subtitles.english: I'll cherish and adore you, meow

subtitles.original: 檻の中の子猫ちゃん
subtitles.english: The kitten inside the cage

subtitles.original: 愛のダンスを さあ 踊りましょ
subtitles.english: Let's dance the dance of love

subtitles.original: 喉鳴らし 擦り寄って ほらどうぞ？
subtitles.english: Purring, rubbing against me, go ahead?

subtitles.original: 睨めっこ あら 甘えん坊さんね
subtitles.english: Staring contest, oh, what a spoiled child

subtitles.original: そっぽを向いても そりゃ結構
subtitles.english: Turning away, that's fine too

subtitles.original: 君はあたしだけの愛猫なの
subtitles.english: You are my beloved cat, only mine

subtitles.original: ダンダン好キニナル 好キニナル ネェ 愛シテ
subtitles.english: Gradually falling in love, falling in love, hey, love me

subtitles.original: ダンダン好キニナル 好キニナル ネェ 愛シテ
subtitles.english: Gradually falling in love, falling in love, hey, love me

subtitles.original: 逃げられやしないの おバカね
subtitles.english: You can't escape, you silly

subtitles.original: 無償の愛が欲しいの 愛して
subtitles.english: I want unconditional love, love me

subtitles.original: 餌が欲しいね だって君は愛猫さん
subtitles.english: You want food, right? Because you're my beloved cat

subtitles.original: Finally!
subtitles.english: Finally!

subtitles.original: We are out of those godforsaken woods.
subtitles.english: We are out of those godforsaken woods.

subtitles.original: Where is my bag?
subtitles.english: Where is my bag?

subtitles.original: I can't find it.
subtitles.english: I can't find it.

subtitles.original: Thou must have mislaid it when we got lost.
subtitles.english: Thou must have mislaid it when we got lost.

subtitles.original: Thou tookest it! Disown it not!
subtitles.english: Thou tookest it! Disown it not!

subtitles.original: Don't play innocent.
subtitles.english: Don't play innocent.

subtitles.original: Thy worthless baubles?
subtitles.english: Thy worthless baubles?

subtitles.original: To what end?
subtitles.english: To what end?

subtitles.original: I spied Fauna with the bag in the forest.
subtitles.english: I spied Fauna with the bag in the forest.

subtitles.original: She probably took it.
subtitles.english: She probably took it.

subtitles.original: Surely thou thinkest not that I would take...
subtitles.english: Surely thou thinkest not that I would take...

subtitles.original: ...something of thine, Namu?
subtitles.english: ...something of thine, Namu?

subtitles.original: Nay, thou art right.
subtitles.english: Nay, thou art right.

subtitles.original: It would seem I need to replenish our funds again.
subtitles.english: It would seem I need to replenish our funds again.

subtitles.original: The bank must be missing my patronage right now.
subtitles.english: The bank must be missing my patronage right now.

subtitles.original: I shan't keep them waiting.
subtitles.english: I shan't keep them waiting.

subtitles.original: I shall see if I can make some coin...
subtitles.english: I shall see if I can make some coin...

subtitles.original: ...performing at the local pub.
subtitles.english: ...performing at the local pub.

subtitles.original: I need some peace and quiet.
subtitles.english: I need some peace and quiet.

subtitles.original: Then I suppose I shall buy some herbs.
subtitles.english: Then I suppose I shall buy some herbs.

subtitles.original: Look at her.
subtitles.english: Look at her.

subtitles.original: So perfect, so effortless.
subtitles.english: So perfect, so effortless.

subtitles.original: Why, heaven, can I not be this perfect?
subtitles.english: Why, heaven, can I not be this perfect?

subtitles.original: This beacon of grace doth mock my every stumble and fall.
subtitles.english: This beacon of grace mocks my every stumble and fall.

subtitles.original: What curse is it that I am condemned to live in this clumsy husk?
subtitles.english: What curse is it that I am condemned to live in this clumsy husk?

subtitles.original: They laugh at my awkwardness...
subtitles.english: They laugh at my awkwardness...

subtitles.original: ...but I despise it with every fiber of my being.
subtitles.english: ...but I despise it with every fiber of my being.
